data.comment: The match has started at Allianz Rivera.
Can Nice get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Monaco's half?
In the minute 2, Nice to take a throw-in in Monaco territory.
Free kick for Nice in the half of Monaco.
Great shot from Monaco's Kevin Volland but he is denied by the crossbar.
In the minute 3, Nice awarded a free kick in their own half.
Monaco drive upfield and Wissam Ben Yedder gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Nice defender.
Karim Abed signals a Nice throw-in in Monaco's half.
In the minute 6, Ball goes out of play for a Nice goal kick.
Monaco's Kevin Volland is on target but unsuccessful.
Monaco have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 9, Youssouf Fofana for Monaco drives towards goal at Allianz Rivera. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Nice close to the penalty box.
Throw-in high up the field for Nice in Nice.
In the minute 11, Wissam Ben Yedder gets his shot on target but fails to score for Monaco.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nice.
Corner awarded to Monaco.
In the minute 16, Monaco are pushing forward but Gelson Martins's finish is wide of the goal.
Nice have a goal kick.
Monaco have been awarded a corner by Karim Abed.
Free kick Monaco.
In the minute 19, Hicham Boudaoui (Nice) gets a yellow card.
Attention is being given to Monaco’s Aurelien Tchouameni and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 20, Monaco’s Aurelien Tchouameni is on his feet again at Allianz Rivera.
Ball safe as Nice is awarded a throw-in in their half.
At Allianz Rivera, Nice are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 21, Free kick for Monaco in their own half.
Corner awarded to Monaco.
Goal! Monaco have taken a 0-1 lead courtesy of a header from Axel Disasi.
In the minute 23, Great play from Youssouf Fofana to set up the goal.
Karim Abed signals a free kick to Nice.
Monaco awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 29, In Nice a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Nice pushes forward through Kasper Dolberg, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in for Nice in their own half.
In the minute 32, Throw-in Monaco.
Can Nice capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Monaco's half?
Monaco needs to be cautious. Nice have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 36, Throw-in for Nice at Allianz Rivera.
Throw-in for Monaco in the half of Nice.
Goal kick for Nice at Allianz Rivera.
In the minute 38, Monaco have been awarded a corner by Karim Abed.
Karim Abed signals a free kick to Nice in their own half.
Karim Abed signals a free kick to Monaco.
In the minute 40, Monaco drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Gelson Martins of Monaco smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Karim Abed awards Monaco a goal kick.
In the minute 44, Karim Abed signals a throw-in for Nice, close to Monaco's area.
Monaco will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Nice.
Nice advance rapidly upfield but Karim Abed blows for offside.
In the minute 45, Karim Abed will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Karim Abed awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick Nice.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Nice.
Karim Abed has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, It's a goal kick for the home team in Nice.
Patrick Vieira (Nice) is making a first substitution, with Andy Pelmard replacing Kephren Thuram Ulien.
Free kick for Nice in the half of Monaco.
Ball goes out of play for a Monaco goal kick.
In the minute 51, Nice's Jeff Reine-Adelaide gets in a shot on goal at Allianz Rivera. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In Nice a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Great finish from Sofiane Diop to give Monaco a 0-2 lead.
In the minute 55, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Nice in their own half.
Free kick for Monaco in the half of Nice.
In the minute 59, Can Monaco capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nice's half?
Karim Abed awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Nice.
In the minute 63, Karim Abed signals a Nice throw-in in Monaco's half.
Karim Abed signals a free kick to Nice.
Monaco awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 65, Wissam Ben Yedder for Monaco gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Nice have a goal kick.
Monaco to take a throw-in in Nice territory.
In the minute 67, Karim Abed signals a free kick to Nice in their own half.
Alexis Claude-Maurice is replacing Hicham Boudaoui for Nice at Allianz Rivera.
The home team have replaced Jeff Reine-Adelaide with Myziane Maolida. This is the third substitution made today by Patrick Vieira.
In the minute 68, Nice make their fourth substitution with Rony Lopes replacing Kasper Dolberg.
Sofiane Diop is booked for the away team.
Goal! The home team reduce the deficit to 1-2 through a strike by Pierre Lees-Melou. .
In the minute 70, Morgan Schneiderlin for Nice has been booked by Karim Abed and receives a first yellow card.
Nice awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Monaco in the half of Nice.
In the minute 73, Ball safe as Nice is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Willem Geubbels is replacing Sofiane Diop for the away team.
In the minute 75, Free kick Nice.
Wissam Ben Yedder (Monaco) has received a yellow card from Karim Abed.
Nice are coming forward and Pierre Lees-Melou gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Karim Abed awards Monaco a goal kick.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Monaco at Allianz Rivera.
Karim Abed signals a throw-in for Nice, close to Monaco's area.
In the minute 79, Nice's Rony Lopes misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Monaco at Allianz Rivera.
The away team replace Kevin Volland with Florentino Luis.
Throw-in for Nice in their own half.
In the minute 81, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Aurelien Tchouameni is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
So close for Monaco as Willem Geubbels's shot comes back off the post.
In the minute 83, Monaco's Aurelien Tchouameni is back in action after a slight knock.
Can Nice get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Monaco's half?
Patrick Vieira is making the team's fifth substitution at Allianz Rivera with Dan Ndoye replacing Stanley N`Soki.
In the minute 85, Djibril Sidibe is on a sub for Gelson Martins for Monaco.
Monaco make their fourth substitution with Pietro Pellegri replacing Wissam Ben Yedder.
Karim Abed signals a Monaco throw-in in Nice's half.
In the minute 87, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Pietro Pellegri of Monaco gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Nice at Allianz Rivera.
In the minute 88, Nice push forward at Allianz Rivera and Dan Ndoye gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Monaco defence.
Nice have been awarded a corner by Karim Abed.
Monaco awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Nice a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Karim Abed signals a free kick to Nice in their own half.
Throw-in for Nice in the half of Monaco.
Free kick for Monaco in their own half.
Throw-in for Nice in their own half.
Karim Abed signals a free kick to Nice.
Monaco awarded a free kick in their own half.
Karim Abed signals a free kick to Monaco in their own half.
Ball safe as Nice is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Full-time! The final score is 1-2.
